description:
The girls decide to have a sleepover at the café, but when Kao-chan promises to help Dogo prepare for the Bamboo festival, everyone decides to help out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Day We Were Enveloped in a Gentle Fragrance, So Yeah
Yasashii Kaori Tsutsumareta Hi, na no de
やさしい香り包まれた日, なので
